column2: Text used within the event
Waking up in the morning, you feel quite rejuvenated...
Mum, Dad, look! I have a normal foot now!
Mum, Dad, look! I'm so much taller!
Mum, Dad, look! I don't longer have a weird lip!
Mum, Dad, look! I can stand like the other kids!
Waking up in the morning, you feel quite rejuvenated...
Mum, Dad? What is a hunting bird?
I feel great today!
I saw a man up the stairs.
Multiplication isn't that hard after all!
Waking up in the morning, you feel quite rejuvenated...
Mum, Dad, look! I can speak properly!
My mom told be I look very beautiful today.
Holding a sword is so much fun!
Tonight, I had a dream, as if god wanted to tell me something...
I must let God guide me through my dreams!
It was probably nothing.
The quest for more money never ends.
I need to have more money!
Wealth is temporary.
The church teaches us to be honest
I should follow the church's teachings
Lying isn't always bad
Lately I have been thinking about the existance of God...
If I can not see it, it does not exist.
We can see God in our everyday lives.
I feel the wisdom of my ancestors flowing through my veins...
I will lead the charge!
I will encircle the enemy!
I will inspire my troops!
Maybe someting else...
Next Page
I feel the wisdom of my ancestors flowing through my veins...
My army will be fast like the wind!
Enemy settlements will crumble!
They won't see it coming...
I feel the wisdom of my ancestors flowing through my veins...
They shall feel my wrath!
They are foolish attacking us!
We will not yield!
My ancestors used to be charitable people.
I should follow my ancestor's steps
They were foolish.
Maybe I should work more in the shadows
This way, I can improve my scheming ability.
What kind of ruler needs to be in the shadows?
My courtiers say that my ancestor was slothful and incapable to rule his realm
I don't think so.
They are right, I should strive to be better than my ancestors!
Tonight, I had a nightmare, as if the devil wanted to tell me something...
I must let the devil guide me through my dreams!
It was probably nothing.
My ancestors always tried to elevate their position in the world
I should try too!
They were greedy and foolish.
Every human should be treated equally...
This is how the world was supposed to be.
...except us.
